p: Pupae of L. sericata, were purchased from Koppert Italia S.R.L. (Verona, Italy), where flies are mass-produced for pollination. The pupae were held in cages until the emergence of the adults which were provided with a solid diet (sugar and yeast 1:1) and water ad libitum. The pupae and adults were kept in laboratory conditions (23°C, 60–70% R.H., natural photoperiod).
